name: MASKO CHANGE !
author: Rigo_v114
notes: I used to run 3 D-Hero Decider in the beginning but i changed the 3rd one for Destiny Draw(spell) and the deck worked better for me. You get to draw 2 cards and also you can dump D-Hero Celestial with it to use it next turn with the banish draw 2 effect. Enemy Controller, Forbidden Chalice, and Cosmic Cyclone great staples for the current meta. Treacherous Trap Hole works wonders with Masked Heroes it's a MUST for me, you use it and you toggle ON then chain Mask Change now your monster isn't targeted anymore with Treacherous. In certain scenarios this play concluded the match, it can get you out of jams aswell.
